sql-select.name: GetInstanceExecProcedures
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT MAX(tDEPS.[last_execution_time]) AS [EventTime] ,tDEPS.[database_id] AS [DatabaseId] ,CASE WHEN (tDEPS.[database_id] = 32767) THEN N'ResourceDB' ELSE MIN(ISNULL(tMSSD.[name], N'')) END AS [DatabaseName] ,tDEPS.[object_id] AS [ProcedureId] ,tDEPS.[type_desc] AS [ProcedureType] ,MIN(OBJECT_NAME(tDEPS.[object_id], tDEPS.[database_id])) AS [ProcedureName] ,SUM(ISNULL(tDEPS.[execution_count], 0)) AS [execution_count] ,SUM(ISNULL(tDEPS.[total_worker_time], 0)) AS [total_worker_time] ,SUM(ISNULL(tDEPS.[total_elapsed_time], 0)) AS [total_elapsed_time] ,SUM(ISNULL(tDEPS.[total_logical_reads], 0)) AS [total_logical_reads] ,SUM(ISNULL(tDEPS.[total_logical_writes], 0)) AS [total_logical_writes] FROM ( SELECT TOP (@intNumberOfRowsToShow) tSDEPS.[last_execution_time] ,tSDEPS.[database_id] ,tSDEPS.[object_id] ,tSDEPS.[type_desc] ,tSDEPS.[execution_count] ,tSDEPS.[total_worker_time] ,tSDEPS.[total_elapsed_time] ,tSDEPS.[total_logical_reads] ,tSDEPS.[total_logical_writes] FROM [sys].[dm_exec_procedure_stats] tSDEPS WHERE tSDEPS.[last_execution_time] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tSDEPS.[last_execution_time] ) AS tDEPS LEFT OUTER JOIN [master].[sys].[sysdatabases] tMSSD ON tMSSD.[dbid] = tDEPS.[database_id] WHERE tDEPS.[last_execution_time] IS NOT NULL AND tDEPS.[database_id] IS NOT NULL AND tDEPS.[object_id] IS NOT NULL AND tDEPS.[type_desc] IS NOT NULL GROUP BY tDEPS.[database_id] ,tDEPS.[object_id] ,tDEPS.[type_desc] ;

sqlite_statements.sqlite_statement: INSERT INTO [hist].[h_ServerInstance] ( [d_Query_id] ,[d_ServerInstance_id] ,[ServerInstanceName] ,[ConnectionName] ) SELECT MIN(dQ.[rowid]) ,MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) ,dSI.[ServerInstanceName] ,MIN(IFNULL(dSI.[ConnectionName], '')) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [d_ServerInstance] dSI ON dSI.[rowid] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[ServerInstanceName] = dSI.[ServerInstanceName] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dSI.[ServerInstanceName] IS NOT NULL AND hSI.[rowid] IS NULL GROUP BY dSI.[ServerInstanceName] ;

UPDATE [hist].[h_ServerInstance] SET [d_Query_id] = @d_Query_id ,[d_ServerInstance_id] = ( SELECT MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) FROM [d_Query] dQ WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] IS NOT NULL ) WHERE [ServerInstanceName] = ( SELECT MIN(dSI.[ServerInstanceName]) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [d_ServerInstance] dSI ON dSI.[rowid] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dSI.[ServerInstanceName] IS NOT NULL ) AND [d_ServerInstance_id] != ( SELECT MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) FROM [d_Query] dQ WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] IS NOT NULL ) ;

INSERT INTO [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] ( [d_Query_id] ,[h_ServerInstance_id] ,[DatabaseId] ,[DatabaseName] ) SELECT MIN(dQ.[rowid]) ,hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[DatabaseName] FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] INNER JOIN [report].[${GetInstanceExecProcedures}$_${1}$] t ON t.[d_Query_id] = dQ.[rowid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND hSID.[rowid] IS NULL GROUP BY hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[DatabaseName] ;

INSERT INTO [hist].[h_InstanceExecProcedureName] ( [d_Query_id] ,[h_ServerInstance_id] ,[DatabaseId] ,[ProcedureId] ,[ProcedureType] ,[ProcedureName] ) SELECT MIN(dQ.[rowid]) ,hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[ProcedureId] ,MIN(IFNULL(t.[ProcedureType], '')) ,MIN(IFNULL(t.[ProcedureName], '')) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] INNER JOIN [report].[${GetInstanceExecProcedures}$_${1}$] t ON t.[d_Query_id] = dQ.[rowid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceExecProcedureName] hIEPN ON hIEPN.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hIEPN.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] AND hIEPN.[ProcedureId] = t.[ProcedureId] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND t.[DatabaseId] IS NOT NULL AND t.[ProcedureId] IS NOT NULL AND hIEPN.[rowid] IS NULL GROUP BY hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[ProcedureId] ;

INSERT INTO [hist].[h_InstanceExecProcedure] ( [d_Query_id] ,[h_ServerInstance_id] ,[DatabaseId] ,[ProcedureId] ,[EventDay] ,[EventTime] ,[execution_count] ,[total_worker_time] ,[total_elapsed_time] ,[total_logical_reads] ,[total_logical_writes] ) SELECT MIN(dQ.[rowid]) ,hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[ProcedureId] ,MAX(date(t.[EventTime])) ,MAX(t.[EventTime]) ,SUM(t.[execution_count]) ,SUM(t.[total_worker_time]) ,SUM(t.[total_elapsed_time]) ,SUM(t.[total_logical_reads]) ,SUM(t.[total_logical_writes]) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] INNER JOIN [report].[${GetInstanceExecProcedures}$_${1}$] t ON t.[d_Query_id] = dQ.[rowid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceExecProcedure] hIEP ON hIEP.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hIEP.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] AND hIEP.[ProcedureId] = t.[ProcedureId] AND hIEP.[EventTime] = t.[EventTime] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND hIEP.[rowid] IS NULL GROUP BY hSI.[rowid] ,t.[DatabaseId] ,t.[ProcedureId] ;
